product_description: 3M Hazard Warning Tape 766 is a black and yellow striped vinyl tape that provides a versatile solution for marking of floors, walls, pipes and other areas in need of warning identification. Easy to apply, it can also be used for floor marking for light traffic areas, and around equipment. This striped vinyl tape features good, instant adhesion to many surfaces and substrates. Unlike messy paint solutions, this vinyl tape is quick to install and easy to remove. Conformability and instant adhesion make it a good and economical choice for a wide variety of applications. Identify and Warn with this Distinctive Tape 3M Safety Stripe Vinyl Tape 766 is a distinctive yellow and black striped vinyl tape coated with a rubber adhesive and designed for use as a marking tape for a variety of warning applications. The rubber adhesive offers quick stick and good holding strength on many substrates. Unlike messy paint solutions, this vinyl tape is quick to install and easy to clean-up. Conformability and instant adhesion makes 3M Safety Stripe Vinyl Tape 766 a good choice for marking and warning applications on floors, equipment, walls and pipes. Recommended Applications: Floor marking; Marking equipment pinch points; Temporary floor marking around spills; Safety markings. 3M Safety Stripe Vinyl Tape 766 features abrasion resistance to excel in light duty identification of equipment and parts. These features, combined with easy removal properties, often makes 3M Safety Stripe Vinyl Tape 766 a faster, more versatile and less costly option than painting when used in marking and coding applications. Bringing Better Ideas to the Surface through Science and Innovation In our 3M Industrial Adhesives and Tapes Division, we apply the science of adhesion to deliver innovative solutions that improve the design and manufacturing processes of companies around the world. In the end, our technologies help customers like you deliver competitive products to the market faster and more efficiently.

name: ACE Supply Reinforced Barricade Tape - Yellow Caution Tape Roll - 3" x300'x5mil - Barricade Tapes for Construction, Utility, Crowd Control, and Emergency Services
short_description: HEAVY-DUTY REINFORCED TAPE: Reinforced polyethylene resists tearing and sagging for reliable barriers on busy jobsites.
HIGH-VIS YELLOW: Solid yellow for universal hazard marking; easy to see in daylight or low light.
SIZED FOR VERSATILITY: 3 in wide × 300 ft long, 5 mil thick—strong yet manageable across posts, cones, or stakes.
WEATHER & UV RESISTANT: Holds up in sun, wind, and rain. Reusable—roll up and redeploy to cut waste.
FAST, TOOL-FREE SETUP: Tie, zip-tie, or wrap to create clean perimeters for construction, utilities, events, and more.
product_description: Build reliable, visible barriers in seconds with this Yellow Reinforced Barricade Tape. Unlike thin caution tape that shreds after a day in the wind, our 5-mil, reinforced polyethylene stands up to active jobsites and unpredictable weather. The solid, unprinted yellow color creates a clear caution signal without text, so it works in any setting and any language. Each roll measures 3 in. wide by 300 ft long—wide enough to be seen from a distance yet easy to handle solo. The internal reinforcement resists tearing and stretching, so spans stay taut between posts, cones, T-posts, stanchions, or stakes. It’s non-adhesive and leaves no residue; simply tie, zip-tie, or wrap to anchor, then cut to length with scissors or a utility knife. Designed for repeated use, the tape rolls back up cleanly when the job is done. Use it for construction zones, utility and survey work, road crews, landscaping, warehouses, event crowd control, parks and recreation, schools, and more. Durable, weather- and UV-resistant material maintains color and integrity in sun, wind, and rain, helping you maintain safe, professional perimeters day after day. If you need a fast, flexible, and economical way to mark hazards, guide foot traffic, or cordon off restricted areas, this reinforced barricade tape delivers dependable performance without constant replacement.
